title: Team Member Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at AIESEC (Cairo, Cairo Governorate)
Interview Descriptions: I had a phone interview it was fully conducted in English and I passed it on the spot. she offered me to go to their main office the next day. I went and two members conducted the interview, they were taking turns in asking me. it's also was conducted in English it took around half an hour.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a problem that faced you and how you dealt with it?

title: Local Committee Vice President Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at AIESEC (Suez) in Jan 2023
Interview Descriptions: so stressful, and I felt most of the time I would be out of this place once I finished my selection process, but as you know, easy comes, easy goes.
Interview Questions: Why do you need this position?

title: Volunteer Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at AIESEC (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Sept 2022
Interview Descriptions: I think , it was pretty good , they were very easy going and direct , when they accepted me they told instantly. Was , , , ,,,,,, , , , very helpful.
Interview Questions: My experience My goals My expectations

title: Volunteer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at AIESEC
Interview Descriptions: It was a virtual interview with one of the project's coordinators. Questions were very expected and extremely easy. Mostly about why you want to join aiesec, why this country, why this project, and what you know about SDGs.
Interview Questions: Mostly about why you want to join aiesec, why this country, why this project, and what you know about SDGs.

title: Team Member Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at AIESEC
Interview Descriptions: it was easy , they were corporative , helpful and friendly . some of the questions were high average that makes you think a lot and some of them were pretty easy , remember they wanna know you better and they wanna know how much you're serious in joining the organization .
Interview Questions: What do you yourself 5 years from now ?

title: Membership Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at AIESEC (Alexandria, Alexandria Governorate) in Jul 2019
Interview Descriptions:
it was a good experience, they focus on good english speaking, confident , good-looking, respectful and intelligent people. 
As I moved up, the process became more refined, depending on the needs of the entity, and depending on the roles I pursued. With greater responsibility comes greater attention to the selection process, and I felt that all of the selection processes I was apart of were handled fairly and democratically
Interview Questions: what's your greatest strength ?

title: OGE Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at AIESEC (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions:
introduce yourself. what is your greatest achievements? tell me 5 uses of the bottle. 
persuade me to travel with aiesec ?why to hire you? why did you choose aiesec?
Interview Questions: persuade me to travel with aiesec

title: Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at AIESEC (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: You fill in the application then wait for response then go to the interview they ask personal and technical questions they are very straight and easy The interview lasts for about 40 mins
Interview Questions: Introduce your self in 5 min

title: IGE Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at AIESEC (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Nov 2018
Interview Descriptions: it went well as it counted as a student to student interview, the interviewer learned to do it right and it's a NGO after all so wasn't expecting much,  but I had fun in the time I spent there
Interview Questions: some normal questions about self

title: Team Member Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at AIESEC (Mansoura) in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions: I filled out the application form, which consisted of simple questions. After that, I was contacted by phone to make an interview, and then I was added to one of the teams through a WhatsApp group.
Interview Questions: The questions are not difficult, but most of them were personal and I was not comfortable during the interview at all

title: Project Management Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at AIESEC
Interview Descriptions: i think it was pretty easy because i have a backgroud of the topic of project managemen so it worked well  it was a positive thing and i loved being there
Interview Questions: sell a fridge

title: Volunteer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at AIESEC (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Feb 2018
Interview Descriptions: They called me on a phone Interview to test my English then they accepted me at the end of it and i'd been invited to 1 to 1 Interview they were two and it was all about personality and situations and i'd been invited to group discussion
Interview Questions: Describe Wifi for your grandmother

title: Sales Manager Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at AIESEC
Interview Descriptions: I applied online. I had to answer some questions about the  role that I applied for and do swat analysis for the role. I submitted the application, Then the HR VP sent me  the  date and place of the interview.
Interview Questions: how can you sell our product for a customer and convince them to travel?

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: The process took 4 days. I interviewed at AIESEC (Cairo, Cairo Governorate)
Interview Descriptions: Interview was easy they were concentrating on how well is your English.  Basic questions on why you chose us and discussing about the roles and experience from your CV. It was a phone interview
Interview Questions: Your experience

title: LCP Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at AIESEC in Oct 2017
Interview Descriptions: I had the opportunity to self-reflect on my past experiences within a one-hour intense interview. The panel focused on my personal skills more than anything else and it's been a very rewarding journey applying for the position.
Interview Questions: Why should we choose you?

title: Team Member Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at AIESEC (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Jul 2017
Interview Descriptions: I applied online then I received an interview phone call, it was testing my English listening and speaking proficiency then they told me about the next interview (face-to-face) and it was really amazing and positive experience
Interview Questions: Tell  me about yourself

title: Teaching Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at AIESEC (Alexandria, Alexandria Governorate) in Nov 2016
Interview Descriptions: it starts with a local interview with the local committee in your country , then you start applying for opportunities and after that you should pass  the international   interview and then sign the contract
Interview Questions: what will you do if lost your passport and mobile  in a foreign country ?

title: OGCDP Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at AIESEC in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: It was 1 interview and I had to fill an application and look for more information to catch up with it, the Tm were just fun but one of them look like he is drunk
Interview Questions: what's make you special and why I choose you?

title: GCDP Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at AIESEC (Cairo, Cairo Governorate)
Interview Descriptions:
This is for AIESEC Egypt Cairo University LC Phone interview ask you few questions to make sure you are a good english speaker 
Face to face interview and its alls about the personality
Interview Questions: 3 strengths 3 weakness

title: Global Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at AIESEC
Interview Descriptions: they called me and make 1 interview face to face to be an aiesecer it was in english . the place in madenet nasr the interviewers were very nice and friendly
Interview Questions: three weakness

title: Member At Multimedia Committee Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at AIESEC (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Oct 2012
Interview Descriptions:
after filling the application online, if you're accepted they call you for a telephone interview, it takes about  5 minutes
if you passed this, they will specify the time for a face to face  interview 
it takes from 30 to 45 minutes
Interview Questions:
they ask you about every specific detail, so try to concentrate while you're talking, because every certain word is countable.
the most difficult question for me was to define truth in one word.
